name: fcgi
description: CGI/FCGI wrapper for neko. Based on the hxfcgi project (https://github.com/TheHippo/hxfcgi).
releasenote:
Ignore env.CONTENT_TYPE on Web.getPostData().
Double getPostData() call error fix.
Move sources from google to bitbucket.
Avoid crash if REQUEST_URI is not sended.
Windows CR/LF fix.
HXFCGI define is not need anymore.
Recompile linux32 & linux64 & Windows.
